sub_title: Finance and Control Manager presso Eni
summary:
An experienced, creative problem solving Oil & Gas E&P and Power Generation Finance Manager working internationally in different locations in Europe and Africa, with a strong track record of leading across cultures and adding value through Fiscal / contractual review and optimization. Strong commitment to developing International staff with demonstrated benefits to organization, morale and profit and loss. 
A native Italian and fluent in English/ French.
